tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_transportation(
    user_id INT,
    option_id INT,
    use_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (option_id) REFERENCES transportation_options(option_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_rewards(
    user_id INT,
    reward_id INT,
    reward_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES rewards(reward_id)
);
